roleset.name: denote, mean, stand for, be indicative of
roleset.note: SIGNIFICANT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on WSJ, signify.01.(from significant.01-j)

example.name: signify-v: transitive
example.text: Uptick -- An expression signifying that a transaction in a listed security occurred at a higher price than the previoustransaction in that security .
example.arg: that a transaction in a listed security occurred at a higher price than the previous transaction in that security

example.name: signify-v: transitive
example.text: `` He does n't signify what people want, so the unrest will go on , '' Mr. Oldenburg predicts .

example.name: significant-j: Both args
example.text: The town's generous library budget is significant of the value its residents place on learning .
example.arg: of the value its residents place on learning

example.name: significant-j: with GOL
example.text: In truth, the electoral result seemed significant to me of the fact that, as I have thought and said for many years now, thiscountry is quite politically ill.
example.arg: of the fact that, as I have thought and said for many years now, this country is quite politically ill

roleset.name: notable in size or importance
roleset.note: SIGNIFICANT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on WSJ data. (from significant.02-j)

example.name: significant-j: arg1
example.text: And though the size of the loan guarantees approved yesterday is significant , recent experience with a similar program inCentral America indicates that it could take several years beforethe new Polish government can fully use the aid effectively .
example.arg: the size of the loan guarantess approved yesterday

example.name: significant-j: With PRD, CAU
example.text: ... the Base Flagpole is significant as an object for its important symbolic and traditional associations with the originsand history of Williams Air Force Base (now Phoenix-Mesa GatewayAirport).
example.arg: for its important symbolic and traditional associations with the origins and history of Williams Air Force Base (now Phoenix-Mesa Gateway Airport).
